wikitext.*:
{{year-header}}
==January==
* '''[[3 January|3]]''' - [[Birthday Toast#Tolkien Society tradition|Birthday Toast]].
* '''[[25 January|25]]''' - Morgan Library's exhibition "[http://www.themorgan.org/exhibitions/tolkien Tolkien: Maker of Middle-earth]" opens.
* '''?''' - ''[[Amon Hen 275]]'' is published.

==February==
* '''[[25 February|25]]''' - ''[[Sub-creating Arda]]'' is published.

==March==
* '''[[22 March|22]]''' - [[Jared Lobdell]] dies.
* '''[[25 March|25]]''' - [[Tolkien Reading Day]].
* '''[[25 March|25]]''' - ''[[Tolkien the Pagan?]]'' is published.
* '''?''' - ''[[Amon Hen 276]]'' is published.

==April==
* '''[[9 April|9]]''' - ''[[Middle-Earth: Journeys in Myth and Legend]]'' is published.

==May==
* '''[[3 May|3]]''' - The biographical film, ''[[Tolkien (film)|Tolkien]]'', is released in the United Kingdom.
* '''[[10 May|10]]''' - The biographical film, ''[[Tolkien (film)|Tolkien]]'', is released in the United States.
* '''[[12 May|12]]''' - Morgan Library's exhibition "[http://www.themorgan.org/exhibitions/tolkien Tolkien: Maker of Middle-earth]" closes.
* '''[[26 May|26]]''' - British actor [[Stephen Thorne]] dies.
* '''?''' - ''[[Amon Hen 277]]'' is published.

==July==
* '''?''' - ''[[Amon Hen 278]]'' is published.

==August==
* '''[[7 August|7]]''' - ''[[Tolkien and the Classics]]'' is published.
* '''[[7 August|7]]-[[11 August|11]]''' - [[The Tolkien Society]]'s [[Tolkien 2019]] event in Birmingham, UK.

==September==
* '''[[5 September|5]]''' - ''[[Tolkien Calendar 2020]]'' is published.
* '''[[13 September|13]] - [[15 September|15]]''' - [[Oxonmoot 2019]] at [http://www.sant.ox.ac.uk St Antony's College].
* '''[[23 September|23]]''' - ''[["Something Has Gone Crack"]]'' is published.
* '''[[26 September|26]]''' - ''[[Tolkien's Lost Chaucer]]'' is published.
* '''?''' - ''[[Amon Hen 279]]'' is published.

==October==
* '''[[7 October|7]]''' - ''[[Music in Tolkien's Work and Beyond]]'' is published.
* '''[[22 October|22]]''' - la BnF's exhibition "[http://www.bnf.fr Tolkien, voyage en Terre du Milieu]" opens.

==November==
* '''[[5 November|5]]''' - ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online: Minas Morgul]]'' is released online. 
* '''[[14 November|14]]''' - ''[[The Hobbit Sketchbook]]'' is published.
* '''?''' - ''[[Amon Hen 280]]'' is published.

==Unknown==
* '''?''' - [[Christopher Tolkien]] confirmed to [[John Garth]] that he did intend to edit [[The End of Bovadium|The Bovadium Fragments]] for publication.<ref>{{webcite|author=[[John Garth]]|articleurl=https://m.facebook.com/story.php?story_fbid=1039122541529866&id=100062963902191|articlename=Here's the cover of Tolkien's satire on Oxford and the motor car, THE BOVADIUM FRAGMENTS, out on 9 October.|dated=May 24, 2025|website=[https://m.facebook.com/ Facebook.com]|accessed=May 30, 2025}}</ref>
